/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their architecture hinting at the urban landscape of the city. In the distance, trees and flags add a touch of nature and cultural symbolism to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun casting a bright light that illuminates the entire scene.
